ShopGreet_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Can I interest you in anything? <sp:5:0:0>Feel free
to take your time.
ShopGreet_01_3:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Welcome to Nembis's Fine Goods.


I'm proud to announce we now stock
<clr:0000>Hateno Cheese<clr:ffff>, made fresh from the milk
of Hateno Village cows to the east!
Please, take a gander at my selection.
Com_Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thank you very much!<sp:5:0:0> Can I take anything
else off your hands?
GoRange_03_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>I hear that<clr:0000> <clr:ffff>the <clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff> are bringing
lots of folks<clr:0000> southeast <clr:ffff>to <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:1:0>

As a merchant, I couldn't possibly miss
a business opportunity like that. Why,
merely thinking about it is thrilling...
Ahem. Shall we get to business?
ShopGoodBye_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I will eagerly await your return!<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>Keep Nembis's Fine Goods in mind for
all your mercantile needs.
Com_Talk_10: <sp:3:0:2:0001>So you want to buy this, then?
Com_Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy>Everything I sell comes with my
personal recommendation!
Com_Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Look at this fine selection of products!<sp:5:1:0>
Take your time.
Com_Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad>I apologize.<sp:5:1:0> We're all out of that
particular product.
Com_Talk_13: <sp:3:0:2:0001>You'll sell that? How many may I buy?
ShopGreet_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Welcome to Nembis's Fine Goods.
Please take a look at our carefully
curated offerings.
Com_Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Notice>Hm? <sp:5:1:0>It looks like you don't have
enough <clr:0000>rupees<clr:ffff>.
Com_Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You've come to shop in spite of this
weather, so...<sp:5:1:0>I'll show you some of my
special wares.
Com_Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think>It looks like your pouch is full.<sp:5:1:0> Please
return when you have the space!
Com_Talk_15: <sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad>I apologize.<sp:5:0:0> I couldn't possibly buy that.
BackRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you're heading <clr:0000>southwest<clr:ffff> to the
deserts of the <clr:0000>Gerudo region<clr:ffff>, you simply
must carry <clr:0000>Chuchu jelly<clr:ffff>. How about it?
Com_Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad>Oh dear.<sp:5:0:0> You'll have to take off those
clothes before selling them.
Thanks00:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Accept this humble gift as a sign of
my gratitude.
Com_Talk_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Very good!<sp:5:0:0> How many would you like
to buy?
GoalPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Hello and welcome. <sp:5:1:0>Just as I predicted,
a customer has arrived!

<sp:3:0:2:0101>I am a merchant, you know.<sp:5:0:0> It's not like
I'm here for no reason.<sp:5:0:0>

<clr:0000>Kakariko Village <clr:ffff>is bubbling due to the
discovery of the <clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff>. A number of
folks pass through, not only researchers.
<sp:3:0:2:0101>This is the very best location to tempt
passersby who are in the market for
quality goods.<sp:5:0:0> So...
Atacked00:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Your arrival is a gift from the heavens!<sp:5:1:0>
Please, help me out here!
BackRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hello there, sir! Say, are you familiar with
<clr:0000>Zora's Domain<clr:ffff>?<clr:0000><clr:ffff>

It's found just past the <clr:0000>Lanayru Wetlands<clr:ffff>
to the <clr:0000>east<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>I used to source fresh fish from the Zora,
but then sludge started falling from the
sky and polluting the water.
Now they don't catch many fish anymore.<sp:5:1:0>
Wretched, eh?

<sp:3:0:2:0701>But enough of that. To happier matters.
Atacked01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>What a timely arrival.<sp:5:0:0> Please, lend me
your help!
BackRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hello there, sir! Say, you look like you've
been to a lot of different places.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>But have you ever traveled to the <clr:0000>Gerudo<clr:ffff>
region in <clr:0000>southwest Hyrule<clr:ffff>?

The desert is a merciless place—the days
are scorching hot, and the nights are
wretchedly cold.<sp:5:0:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>But here's a trick to make it bearable...<sp:5:1:0>
<clr:0000>Chuchu jelly<clr:ffff>! Even the name is charming.

When it's hot, break it open and soak in
the water. <sp:5:0:0>When it's cold, the jelly is as
good as coals.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>What a miraculous substance! There's no
excuse not to carry it. And if a merchant
happened to have it on hand...<sp:5:0:0>well!
Near_Rain: I must keep my goods dry.
RestPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Things may not be going my way, but I
won't let that hold me back! <sp:5:1:0>So!
BackRange_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey there! Have you been to <clr:0000>Kakariko
Village<clr:ffff>, the place everyone's talking
about right now?
Getting there is as simple as traveling
<clr:0000>southeast <clr:ffff>on this road.

Lots of folks have been heading that
direction since the <clr:0000>Ring Ruins <clr:ffff>started
falling in the area.<clr:0000>
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><clr:ffff>You're bound to run into them if you go
this way.

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Say, if there are crowds, there will
be customers!<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:0:2:2:5000>I really AM good at business, aren't I?<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>Ahem. Anyway, please take a look...<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Com_Talk_36:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'm out of stock—can you believe it?!<sp:5:1:0>
Thank you for your patronage!
GoRange_04_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Have you heard? <clr:0000>Zora's Domain<clr:ffff>, long at
the mercy of that wretched sludge, has
returned to its tranquil self.
And even better, that means the Zora's 
tasty fish are back in stock! And so...
BackRange_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hello there, sir! Good news—the sludge
plaguing <clr:0000>Zora's Domain <clr:ffff>has disappeared!

I've been able to procure fresh fish from
the Zora for the first time in ages.

<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy>Just look at my selection of fine seafood!
Doesn't get any better than this, eh?
Com_Talk_37:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Thank you for your business! With your
help, I have sold out of, well, everything.<sp:5:1:0>

I may not have anything left in stock,
but would you like to preview my
upcoming wares?
Com_Talk_05c: <sp:3:0:2:0001>I'll buy your goods for a fair price.
SavedLv1_01: <sp:3:0:2:0700>I had no clue what to do.<sp:5:1:0> You saved me!
RainPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hello there! <sp:5:1:0>You look like someone who
enjoys purchasing items.

Did you know some merchants don't work
on rainy days? <sp:5:1:0>I call them amateurs!

Real pros don't mind a little falling water.
You simply go out there, stay dry, and try
not to give in to despair.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Eventually, a customer will appear...<sp:5:1:0>like
you did!
Com_Talk_05d: <sp:3:0:2:0001>What do you have to offer me?
StartPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hello, sir! Pardon my query, but are you
familiar with <clr:0000>Eldin<clr:ffff>?

The region is famed for its enormous
volcano, <clr:0000>Death Mountain<clr:ffff>. The mountain
can guide you <clr:0000>north<clr:ffff>, straight to <clr:0000>Eldin<clr:ffff>!<sp:5:0:0>
The lava once made it unbearably hot, but
I hear it's more comfortable these days.

<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>The caves are still scorching, mind!<sp:5:0:0>
Take care to prepare <clr:0000>elixirs <clr:ffff>if you ever
need to enter.
Say, if you're going to <clr:0000>Eldin<clr:ffff>, how about
you purchase ingredients for those
elixirs now?<sp:5:1:0>
I have a modest collection here...
GoRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad><clr:0000>Zora's Domain <clr:ffff>is to the <clr:0000>east<clr:ffff>, but I hear
it's been struggling with a deluge
of <clr:0000>sludge<clr:ffff>.
That means I have fewer fish in stock,
but I don't compromise on quality.
Please, take a look.
BackRange_03_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>You'll reach <clr:0000>Kakariko Village <clr:ffff>if you go
<clr:0000>southeast<clr:ffff>. Something called the <clr:0000>Ring
Ruins<clr:ffff> is bringing a lot of folks in.
Are you going to see the ruins for
yourself?<sp:5:1:0> In any case...
SavedLv2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I was worried about my wares, but all is in
order.<sp:5:0:0> I'm so relieved!
SavedLv2_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm more skilled at the art of business
than the art of war. <sp:5:1:0>I'm in your debt.
RestPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Hello, sir...<sp:5:0:0> Do you have a moment to
listen to my woes?

The problem...<sp:5:1:0> The problem is...<sp:0:4:0>I haven't been selling anything. <sp:5:1:0>At all.


I thought I'd curated the perfect offerings
to suit the region's climate. <sp:5:1:0>I even threw
in a few unusual specialty goods.
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>Ah, well, it's a new day!<sp:5:1:0> And I have
a feeling you're about to make a
large purchase.
Um, right?
GoalPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>A lot of folks are heading to <clr:0000>Kakariko
Village <clr:ffff>to see the <clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff>.

I thought I'd take advantage of the
crowds by setting up shop in front of
this gate!
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Anyway, you didn't come to hear about
my business plan. You're looking to trade!
Tell me, what do you want to do?
Guardian00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Scare>What in the world is that?!<sp:5:0:0> It's ripped
from a nightmare!
GoRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Pardon, sir! Are you familiar with
<clr:0000>Zora's Domain<clr:ffff>?

You'll reach the home of the <clr:0000>Zora<clr:ffff> if you
head <clr:0000>east<clr:ffff>!

Everyone knows it has a fine reputation
for healthy fish, but I hear more sludge
than rain has been falling recently.
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Sad>Apparently the water is no longer clean,
and fishing has grown more difficult.

I sell fewer fish now, but I have developed
a keener eye for quality. Take a look!
ShopTalk_01: <sp:3:0:2:0701>Can I interest you in anything else?
GoRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hello there, sir! Say, have you ever
visited <clr:0000>Hebra<clr:ffff>? Or perhaps you're familiar
with its largest settlement, Rito Village?
Hebra's an incredibly cold region in the
mountains to the northwest. It's so
chilly that <clr:0000>spicy peppers<clr:ffff> are a must.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>One can shrug off even the most ruthless
cold by eating a dish prepared with a
<clr:0000>spicy pepper<clr:ffff>!<sp:5:0:0> Now, to business...
GoRange_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you continue down the road to the
<clr:0000>southeast<clr:ffff>, you'll reach <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>.

The village has been bustling ever since
the <clr:0000>Ring Ruins <clr:ffff>were discovered there.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Crowds of people means lots of business.
So I will go, of course.<sp:5:1:0> Now, let us do
some business of our own...
RainPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Rain or shine, the machines of commerce
must keep humming along! <sp:5:1:0>So!
GoRange_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hello there, sir! Are you familiar with
<clr:0000>Zora's Domain<clr:ffff>?

You'll find the <clr:0000>Zora<clr:ffff>'s home <clr:0000>east<clr:ffff> of here.
Blessedly, the sludge has disappeared,
and they can catch tasty fish again.
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy>And do tasty fish interest you, sir?<sp:5:1:0>
Well, you're in luck! I have some in stock.<sp:5:0:0>
Take a look...
GoRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Head far to the <clr:0000>northwest <clr:ffff>and you'll
arrive at <clr:0000>Hebra<clr:ffff>, which is best known
for <clr:0000>Rito Village<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0>
It's dreadfully cold, so make sure your
bag is packed with <clr:0000>spicy peppers<clr:ffff> when
you go. Now, to business...
Near_GoRange_02: If it's truly cold, you need...
SavedLv3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I was in quite a plight! <sp:5:1:0>I'm fortunate
you chanced by.
BackRange_04_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Now that the sludge is gone, I can get fish
from <clr:0000>Zora's Domain <clr:ffff>once more!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>If you need someone with a keen eye for
fine fish, I'm your man.<sp:5:0:0> Take a look...
SavedLv3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You saved me!<sp:5:0:0> These days, you need to
risk your life to do business.
BackRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you're looking for <clr:0000>Zora's Domain<clr:ffff>, it's
to the <clr:0000>east<clr:ffff>. And if you're looking to buy
something, well, I'm right here.
*sigh* The <clr:0000>sludge<clr:ffff> falling from the sky has
been quite the trial for the poor Zora.

If you must head that direction, perhaps
my wares can help you prepare.
StartPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>You'll reach <clr:0000>Eldin <clr:ffff>if you head <clr:0000>north<clr:ffff>.
I hear the caves are so scorching that
you'll crisp up without an <clr:0000>elixir<clr:ffff>!
If you're heading that way, are you
interested in purchasing ingredients?
I have a modest collection here...
